org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation

Class SparkRuntimeContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.spark.translation.SparkRuntimeContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class SparkRuntimeContext
extends Object
implements Serializable
    The SparkRuntimeContext allows us to define useful features on the client side before our data flow program is launched.
    See Also:
